title: Denise Welch appeals to fans to vote for Loose Women at the National Television Awards in a swimsuit
text:
Loose Women won the NTA for Factual Entertainment Programme in 2010.

And Denise Welch is keen to get the talk show an award once again, as she took to Instagram to share a video from sunny Beverly Hills on Friday.

The TV personality, 61, posed in an animal-print swimsuit which had dramatic red ombre stripes across one side.

Chic: Denise Welch looked sensational in an animal-print swimsuit as she appealed to fans to vote for Loose Women at the National Television Awards in an Instagram video on Friday

Denise completed her look by wearing a pair of orange heels and stylish sunglasses, while her ivory locks were brushed into a tousled style.

Giving a twirl and dramatically taking off her sunglasses to start the video, she began by saying hello when her husband Lincoln Townley burst out laughing and asked what she was doing.

Denise reprimanded: 'Darling just do the video, be quiet.'

Stylish: The TV personality, 61, posed in an animal-print swimsuit which had dramatic red ombre stripes across one side

She then continued: 'I'm here in Beverly hills as you can see on behalf of Loose Women, appealing for votes for the National Television Awards.'

But Lincoln couldn't help but chime in again, as he laughed: 'What, in a swimsuit and high heels?'

Visibly irritated, the Coronation Street star said firmly: 'Darling, it's going to have more attraction if it's from an ex supermodel.'

Glam: Denise completed her look by wearing a pair of orange heels and stylish sunglasses, while her ivory locks were brushed into a tousled style

'It's ten years since we won at the National Television Awards, which you know what was great seeing the smug smiles wiped off the faces of the guys from Top Gear,' she continued.

'It was brilliant, so if you would like to see us once more wipe the smug smiles from other peoples faces then vote for Loose Women at the National Television Awards.'

The National Television Awards is set to take place on January 28, 2020.
